events.name: InventoryItemAdded
events.description: Captures the action of adding a new item to the inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemRemoved
events.description: Captures the action of removing an item from the inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemUpdated
events.description: Captures the action of updating item details in the inventory.

events.name: InventoryChecked
events.description: Captures the action of checking the inventory levels.

commands.name: AddInventoryItem
commands.description: Captures the action of adding a new item to the inventory.

commands.name: RemoveInventoryItem
commands.description: Captures the action of removing an item from the inventory.

commands.name: UpdateInventoryItem
commands.description: Captures the action of updating item details in the inventory.

commands.name: CheckInventory
commands.description: Captures the action of checking the inventory levels.

integrationPoints.name: SalesOrderManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration required to manage inventory levels when a sale is made.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration needed to update inventory upon receiving new stock from suppliers.

integrationPoints.name: WarehouseManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration needed for inventory storage and retrieval.
